dublinCore.dc:title: 119 SRES 14 ATS: Electing Robert M. Duncan, of the District of Columbia, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Thune submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Electing Robert M. Duncan, of the District of Columbia, as Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.

section.text: That Robert M. Duncan of the District of Columbia be, and he is hereby, elected Secretary for the Majority of the Senate.
